title.rendered: His Excellency Zubairu Dada received in audience a delegation of Nigerians In Diaspora (NIDO)

content.rendered:
The Hon. Minister of State for Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Zubairu Dada received in audience a delegation of Nigerians In Diaspora (NIDO), UK South Chapter today, 19th July, 2022.
The delegation was led to the Ministry by the Chairman of NiDCOM, Hon. Abike Dabiri. On the delegation was Susan Waya, Chair of NIDO UK South, Femi Ikutiyinu, General Secretary, and the Chair NIDO Poland among other NIDO dignitaries.
Discussions centred on the 2022 “A Week in Nigeria Project” of the organization, holding from 18th -25th July. The focus is on the humanitarian and developmental efforts of the organization in Nigeria.
